translations: n.菩提树；[林] 印度榕树

sentences.sentence: The banyan tree has aerial roots.
Banyan trees, unlike rubber trees, can keep groundwater.
sentences.translation: 与橡胶树不同，榕树可以保存地下水。

sentences.sentence: The more banyan trees are planted, the more clean water villagers will get.
sentences.translation: 榕树种得越多，村民得到的干净的水就越多。
